settings.markdownTextPattern:
Total

${energy:2} kWh
flash_on
Energy consumed per minute
flash_on
settings.markdownTextFunction:
const unit = { from: 'kWh', METRIC: 'kWh', IMPERIAL: 'MBtu', HYBRID: 'kWh' } var energy = ctx.unitService.convertUnitValue(data[0]['energy'], unit).toFixed(2); var curUnit = ctx.unitService.getTargetUnitSymbol(unit); return `

Total

${energy} ${curUnit}
flash_on
Energy consumed per hour
`;
